Development_ItemObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Development_ItemObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Development_ItemObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Development_Item_Data.description: Reference to the Worker who owns the current Development Item.

Development_Item_Version_Data.description: A unique identifier for the Development Item.
Title field of the referenced Development Item
Additional Information field for the referenced Development Item

Development_Item_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Development_Item_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Development_Item_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Development_Item_Version_Data.description: Category field for the referenced Development Item
Start Date field for the referenced Development Item
Completion Date field for the referenced Development Item

Development_Item_StatusObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Development_Item_StatusObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Development_Item_StatusObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Development_Item_Version_Data.description: The status of the Development Item.  The status is required and must be an active Development Item Status.
Status Note field for the referenced Development Item

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Development_Item_Version_Data.description: Updated by Worker Reference is the worker updating the Development Item. If left empty, the processing worker will be used.

Talent_TagObjectID.type: WID,  Competency_ID,  Development_Item_ID,  Gig_ID,  Job_Profile_ID,  Training_ID,  Work_Experience_ID
Talent_TagObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Talent_TagObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Development_Item_Version_Data.description: Tag Reference for Development Items based on Competency, Job Profile, and Work Experience Skill.

Development_Item_Data.description: Contains detailed data for the referenced Development Item

validation.validation: Select an active Development Item Status.
A Development Item may not have an inactive Category.
The Completion Date must be on or after the Start Date.
